name: Karura Forest
description: A beautiful urban forest offering hiking trails, picnic sites, and waterfalls.

name: Nairobi National Museum
description: Showcasing Kenya's history, culture, and contemporary art.

description: A full wildlife safari experience just minutes from the city.

description: Famous elephant orphanage known for conservation efforts.

description: Historical locomotives and railway history of East Africa.

name: Uhuru Park
description: A popular recreational park in the heart of Nairobi.
